title: Calendar, 9/13/15
content:
SUNDAY 
1 p.m. — Make It Grand: Grandparents Day Event, near the east fountain at Sunset Mall, 4001 Sunset Drive 
2 p.m. — Chamber Music Series featuring María Ávalos and Francisco Rocafuerte, San Angelo Museum of Fine Arts, 1 Love St. 
5:30 p.m. — Film screening: “Unbranded,” McNease Convention Center, 500 Rio Concho Drive 
MONDAY 
9 a.m. — Book lecture: Jeffrey Holle discusses “Rainforest Cowboys,” C.J. Davidson Conference Center, Houston Harte University Center, 1910 Rosemont Drive 
Noon — Tres Amigos Champions Advocating 4 Children Golf Classic, San Angelo Country Club, 1609 Country Club Road 
3 p.m. — 23rd annual Wing Fling Dove Hunt, St. Ambrose, 8602 Texas Loop 570, Wall 
6:30 p.m. — Vino Dipinte art class, Penny Tap House, 2412 College Hills Blvd.
